inn1.comm: starts on leg and Perera makes no mistake with a clip off the legs through square, a very confident beginning for the batsman
a better line down off at 134kph, the batsman elects to leave that one, sensible too
on middle and off, presses out off the legs once more to square again
straight again, on middle and off, again Perera clips off the legs, the ball racing in front of midwicket
stands firm and defends on the front foot down off this time, better ball from Munaf
and on the money again, good length in line with off, the batsman defends on the front foot
pushed out to cover point for a quick single
clamps down on a forward defensive, pushed out towards mid-on
good line, and good lick too - 148kph there - the batsman coming forward to defend on the front foot in line with off
searing yorker, angling in on to the stumps in front of off, the batsman fast to dig it out
more inswing, the batsman coming outside off to defend on the front foot
wide down leg, the batsman chases after it, but too late, some encouraging swing however
banged down the channel, short at 139.3kph, and the batsman shoulders arms quickly
short outside off and you can't bowl there to Mr Jayasuriya, as he rocks on to his back foot and scythes hard through point
up there on off, a good reply, this time prompting a defence on the front foot
tidy again, shortish but in line with off, Jayasuriya waits and defends down on the back foot
whistled down off on a good length at 138kph, the batsman quick to lift his arms out of danger
tight again, this one on middle and off, Jayasuriya defending on the front foot, compactly
pushes it slightly across him outside off, defended on the front foot
pushed down leg, the batsman chasing round but again too late
a much better ball, zipping past the outside edge on the rise
straight through him there, Ishant pitches on off on a great length,  Perera came out to drive forward but the ball beats the outside edge and held its line to clip the off stump
starts with a forward defensive
outside off, Sangakkara drives out to cover, there's fingertip there but not enough to prevent the single
ripper of a delivery, a fine length at 142 kph, brushes the pad on its way through, but the ball was outside off by then
a straighter delivery, full, Jayasuriya drives into the ground, the ball losing all its pace at that point and flying up over towards the bowler
pushed down off on a good length, the ball rising and carrying on away from the left hander who shoulders arms
down off, angled across the batsman again on a decent pitch, the batsman leaving it alone
a horrid shot from Sangakkara, that won't be on the highlights reel, stepping out and just clearing the slips with a huge outside edge over the two slips from a would-be cover drive
lets that one through without much trouble this time
Sangakkara's at sea so far today, here he drives away from his body and sends another edge through, this time it bounces just short of a rolling Dhoni
on off, defended on the front foot this time
pushed down on the front foot away to mid-off
pushed up there outside off, driven out to mid-off
pushed through well down off
a great line again, angled well across the left hander who shoulders arms early, and Dhoni takes the follow-through
on the legs, clipped out to square for an easy single
well bowled once again, the yorker in line with off, gets right over it in defence
up there on off, good length, defended back out on the front foot
across the bowler, so close to the stumps he bowled over them, and pushed straight down the channel to the batsman who defends on off
defended on the front foot now
outside off, driven to the covers
strayed a touch onto leg, pushed off the thigh toward square
super delivery, ripped that right past the off stump and it was rising too, that one only just past the outside edge
way wide outside off, driven over the covers very well indeed
overpitched outside off, driven down to mid-off
some more width and the batsman climbs into a very strong cover drive, leaning into that shot and forcing the momentum through
good delivery, just to say outside off on a good length, and the batsman shoulders arms again
Ishant gets away with a wide ball outside off, the batsman aiming to pull it round but doesn't get hold of the shot too well, the ball crashing into the ground

outside off and good placement from Sangakkara who negotiates the gap at cover with a mere push which nearly sends the ball all the way to the rope along the floor but Praveen Kumar does very well to slide and stop it going for four
pushed across the left hander who leaves it alone
straight ball, from wicket to wicket, the batsman defends solidly on the front foot
short ball on middle and leg, defended back down off the back foot

outside off, short ball testing the batsman who tries to push out off the back foot into the covers, instead the inside edge crashes down and nearly on to the stumps, the ball skewing off behind square but could have gone anywhere
outside off, defended on the front foot into the covers
on middle and leg, turned into short midwicket
that one hit Jayasuriya before he was ready for it, a short one which jagged across him on the rise, the batsman taking a blow on the forearm
pushed through from over the wicket, on a good length, the batsman shouldering arms
wide outside off, crunched through the covers with a very firm drive indeed
fired through across him, good length this time, Sangakkara quick to shoulder arms
too full on off, the batsman pushes out through mid-on, fairly straight
tight across the left hander who lets the ball go through this time

good length on middle and leg, pushed down off the back foot and the batsmen rush through quickly, good running, Munar was quick to push the ball towards the stumps with his feet, smiling good-naturedly after missing
on the legs, turned off dead square out to the deep, where it's tidied up
waits on off and defends on the back foot back towards the bowler
on leg, turned off the legs fine through the appropriately named fine leg
on leg, wristed off again , this time just behind square
outside off, Jayasuriya  pulls high and higher wide of long-on, the ball bouncing just inside the rope and hopping over for four
over the wicket, left armer to left hander, the ball curling gently out after pitching outside off, the batsman pressing down in defence
good length, full, and forcing the forward defensive in line with off
curled in from outside off to an off-stump line, the batsman defends forward
forces the ball towards the legs, the batsman looks to squeeze to midwicket, a good length though, not much room
pushed on to middle and leg again, driven out to mid-on where Yuvraj Singh gets in on the action with a dive out, clasping the ball on the stretch
forced up there on middle and leg, turned into short midwicket where the shy comes in, just wide, but Jayasuriya would have been in anyway
from over the wicket, forces the ball past the left hander who waits and defends outside off on a good length
bangs in too short at 138kph, the batsman squeezes off the legs to midwicket
outside off, cut hard into the ground in front of point
a tight ball outside off at 134kph, the batsman waits and defends into the ground on the back foot
outside off, a touch full, and Jayasuriya goes over the top with a push of an aerial drive, the bottom hand coming into play there
on the legs, turned away to deep square, good placement
the ball comes in outside off just back of a length, the batsman cuts out to point
outside off, a touch short, steered away to third man off the back foot, just opening the face to guide it there
played down defensively off the back foot
banged in short, the batsman taking evasive ducking action as the ball flies on over off stump
planted on a good length in line with off, all the batsman can do is come forward to defend on the front foot
another good-length delivery, much the same as the last ball, defended on the front foot
got him! Sangakkara charges and then pokes at a short one down off, opening the face and prodding straight into Dhoni's hands
outside off at 129.7kph, the ball curling only a touch and it's pretty wide, allowing the batsman to leave first up
outside off, Jayawardene opens the face and pushes down behind him off the back foot
comes out and defends on the front foot, a good-length ball in line with off
on middle and leg, turned into the leg-side with a quick press
straight on middle and off, defended back on the front foot
forced across the right hander, who defends on the front foot
well bowled indeed, just angled it across the right hander, the ball pitching outside off and veering wider off the seam, the batsman beaten
another good line, Jayawardene is more in control this time, leaving it alone strongly
slower ball at 133.4kph, defended on the front foot out towards mid-on
more of the good stuff, Irfan again hits a good length and the ball pushes through
another good ball to finish a tidy maiden, the batsman pushing forward
defended on the front foot
a wide called from a short one which wobbled high over leg
on middle and leg, turned out in front of square
good length on off, Jayawardene waits for the ball and then defends on the front foot
outside off and Jayawardene comes down the track and goes aerial, driving over the top wide of long-off for two
outside off, and that's a screamer of a catch, Jayawardene laces hard off the back foot to point where it's taken very quickly and very low by Rohit Sharma
plants wide down off, deliberately, on a good length but the batsman's not tempted, shouldering arms
tidy on off, Jayasuriya comes forward and clamps down on a forward defence
on off again and once more defence is the only form of defence
full delivery in front of off again, once more defended with something of a push-drive towards mid-off
back of a length delivery, pushed round through fine leg
pushed across him, defended into the covers on the front foot
on the legs, a touch short, pushed out to midwicket and the batsman sets off but is sent back
defended on the back foot
outside off, cut down behind point, the ball running out deep
quality delivery from Kumar, and another good catch from Dhoni - the ball coming outside off, straightening on the rise and Silva pops through to the keeper off the back foot
defends on the front foot
it's all action here, the batsman coming down to look to move to the leg-side, getting tangled in line with leg, the ball likely bouncing over
squeezed a tight defence into the off-side now
fires in short outside off, played down off the back foot
comes outside off, and defends strongly on the front foot outside his crease and the line of the stumps
banged in outside off, Jayasuriya goes for a huge hook and doesn't get over it, instead the ball flies up high and Dhoni shuffles round a few paces, with plenty of time to set himself for the catch
lets that one go through outside off
good angle across the right hander, defended off the back foot into the covers
fired across him, defended on the back foot into the covers
outside off, just a hint of room to drive out square in front of deep point
good delivery, testing the batsman down the channel on a good length, left alone in the air
outside off, pushed into the covers defensively
short outside off, swivel-pulled round through midwicket
just to say wide down off, the ball moving away after pitching
outside off, pushed into the covers on the front foot, and they scramble through
nipped back in from outside off, defended on the front foot
comes forward on the front-foot defence
pushed across the right hander outside off, he presses down in defence towards the covers
right up there on off, defended on the front foot
touch of room outside off, cut off the back foot behind point
overpitched on off, attempted yorker driven out towards Uthappa
short ball and a welcome boundary for Sri Lanka, the batsman lifting the ball behind square leg
moves on to the back foot to defend down into the short cover region
fired up towards the batsman who defends into the covers
a gentle loop outside off, the batsman gets into the line and defends on the back foot
full delivery on the front foot, defended on middle and leg
you couldn't get a sliver of rice paper through there, defended watertightly on the front foot
full delivery, deliberately so, on line with off, and defended into the covers on the front foot
starts well in line, defended back down on the back foot
turned in from outside off, the batsman squares the face towards point and plays down on the back foot
a huge shout for one which was veering on towards middle and leg, Dilshan was across but not far forward, and there wasn't much wrong at all there
across him, good rise from one at 138kph, Vaas is tight in back-foot defence
fired across him outside off, the batsman makes an extravagant leave
another good delivery fittingly finishes off a tidy over, the ball whistling past the outside edge from a good length
a hint of wobble away from the batsman who comes forward to defend
shoulders arms early and deliberately, the ball going through on a good length
outside off, cut down off the back foot, chopping into the ground
outside off, defended on the front foot into the covers
outside off, popped up but very safely, the batsman trying to turn it to midwicket on the back foot
defended on the front foot into the covers
rushed down outside off, the batsman lets it go through on a good length
Ishant comes round the wicket this time, and the batsman watches it on to the stumps, defending in front of them
banged in short down off and induces a false shot from the batsman who pulls under it
outside off, the batsman pulls up and over to midwicket, where it's taken easily, Vaas not getting over the ball at all
pushed through down the off-side channel, left alone
cut back in from outside off, defended into the covers on the front foot
pushed past the outside edge
on the legs, turned back down through fine leg for an easy single
pushed across the right hander, just back of a length, tipped back down into the covers off the back foot
pushed across him, quite wide down off, left alone
round the wicket, wide outside off, left alone
bent back in from pretty wide outside off, defended on the front foot into the covers
outside off, shortish, defended back down
a bit of a half-volley outside off, driven out through extra cover
on off, turned out in front of midwicket
outside off, opens the face with a flashy prod of some control wide down to third man
angles in on middle, a low curve, and the ball's defended on the front foot
hip-high full toss slips out on line with leg and is defended into the leg-side
on off, pushed down into the gully
good line on middle and off, tight too, and the batsman can only defend on the front foot
shuffles outside off, defended back into the ground, with what would have been an off-drive
slower ball at 127.5kph, defended on the front foot
comes outside off and down the track, the batsman trapping the ball under his bat and it splayed out to the leg-side
clamped down into the legs, off out to short midwicket and they run through
floated past the outside edge, the batsman fending at it, his bat behind his pad
over the wicket across the right hander who plays down on the front foot, defensively
oh, the plan nearly came off, Irfan forcing past the outside edge, wide, Malinga tempted into the cut
outside off, squares into the ball, and pokes down to gully
pushed down the channel outside off, the batsman shouldering arms
attempted yorker, pressed out through square on the off side
welcome runs, the batsman sweeping it easily down to fine leg
pushed in from outside off, full delivery, defended on the front foot
reaches outside off to sweep through square
full delivery on middle and leg, turned out to short square
close to the outside edge, thought about the cut but the ball roses up unexpectedly and hopped over the bat
driven out to the covers
on middle, a shortish ball helped round the corner and they come back for the second
forced down the off-side, the batsman comes over, sniffs, turns his nose up, and leaves
a tight line on off, rising a touch, the batsman defends off the back foot and the ball rolls out slowly to the covers
width outside off, pushed off the back foot now
full delivery on off, pushed out on the front foot
on middle and off, pushed out on the front foot to the leg-side
on off, turned out to square without much power
up there, full, and defended with a trap under the bat on the front foot
outside off, pushed into the covers and they scramble through quickly
driven out wide of mid-off for another gentle single
on off, forced into square
tight delivery up there on off, defended on the front foot
outside off, pushed defensively into the covers on the front foot
good loop outside off, a very good sweep through midwicket
outside off, pushed into the legs
on off, turned to midwicket for an easy single
comes out and defends on the front foot
got him to fish outside off, the batsman pressing forward to the covers and missing
slinks it down the channel on a good length and tight line, the batsman lets it go through
very tight again on off, pushed out on the front foot to the covers
good yorker now, the batsman looks to be aggressive and then digs it out on the front foot
outside off, driven on the up wide of mid-off and it's a very slow outfield, the ball pulling up inside the rope
defended well on the front foot, kept quiet by that one
cramped him again with a full ball on middle and off, defended in front of the toes
good length outside off, and plenty of loop, Malinga pads up away from the body
outside off again and Malinga presses up to midwicket, the cry of "Catch" going in vain as it bounced in front of the fielder
a gentle single knocked into the covers
dropped! A big nick to Tendulkar's left at first slip, the topspinner getting the prod outside off
pressed out to the covers on the front foot
outside off, cut down to gully and although the hit's a direct one it looks like he's home. The third umpire is called in to verify but he was in by miles, OK a metre or so
pushes down leg, with some handy bounce, but had just strayed too far
placed up there on a decent line and length, defended on the front foot with a good squeeze
on middle and leg, pushed out defensively towards mid-on
more of the tight stuff, defended in line with middle and off, the length impeccable
on middle, turned to short midwicket
outside off, a touch short and he makes no mistake with a fulsome pull shot lifted up and over midwicket, bouncing just inside the rope
too straight and whipped down through fine leg, the ball brushing the pads en route and running on fine
comes forward and defends on the front foot
pushed up there on off and once more it's kept out defensively
Malinga, a touch frustrated, goes to turn the ball to midwicket but it's on to him too quickly
pushed out towards mid-on this time
rocks back into the shot and executes a hard cut through the covers, a good chase prevents the boundary
big shout for one which cuts back and raps him high on the thigh
banged it outside off, cut hard in front of point
outside off, left through
waits outside off and prods down behind gully with little foot movement

outside off and yet again Sri Lankan shot selection lets them down, although credit to the bowler at the same time, beating him for pace and Malinga tried to pull it but the ball went high and up over to Uthappa who set himself to take the catch at mid-off
outside off, pushed into the covers
down the track and that was ever so nearly five for Ishant, the batsman going for the hard drive and almost dragging an inside edge back on
beats the outside edge with one that turned past his outside edge
strayed down leg this time
up there on off, and a half shout
another half shout for a forward defensive
ripped too quickly down off, Murali cutting hard at it
on middle and leg, pushed forward  and they decide not to take the single to keep Kapugedera on strike next over
defended down easily off the back foot
outside off, pushed into the covers on the front foot
full delivery on middle and leg, forced out wristily between midwicket and mid-on
ripped through down outside off
on off, rising delivery, tucked back down off the back foot into short midwicket
banged down off, too wide for the batsman to be tempted into anything
attempted yorker, the batsman eases back and stabs down, the ball easing down to third man
on middle and leg, turned into midwicket
overpitched on off and a great booming drive out through extra cover, the sweeper Gambhir doing his job
short, sharp bouncer kept fairly low and the batsman ducks under very quickly
outside off, the batsman backs away and cuts off the back foot to point
good length past the batsman on off, he defends into point
on off, Murali takes a half step forward and drives up and over mid-on with nothing more than a short-arm jab
outside off, short ball, driven off the back foot without much power into the covers
down the track outside off, Kapugedera goes aerial and out towards Gambhir inside the rope at deep midwicket who catches it then throws it back on to the pitch, going over with the momentum
driven out straight to long-on, a quiet kind of shot
outside off, cuts out to deep square off the back foot
on middle and nipping out, the batsman plays forward into the covers
outside off, driven wide of the man at long-off
pushed out quietly to mid-on
fired right up there and inside-edges back on to his pad
pushed forward, defensively
swept up to the gap at midwicket, one hand coming off the bat
popped up and cut down wide of the keeper
on middle and off, driven out easily to wide mid-on
driven out to the covers for an easy single
full toss too straight for the batsman to do much with other than poke forward
driven on the front foot to short midwicket
outside off, and driven up and over extra cover
prompts the defensive with a good-length ball played forward
backs away, exposing all of his stumps but he cuts out behind point
right up there on off, he comes forward and defends tightly
paddled round the corner for a lazy single to bring Kapugedera back on strike
not much width at all, but he somehow manages to make room to cut hard in front of point
turned in on middle, Kapugedera wrists it back out to square to bring up a face-saving fifty against the tide of wickets
past him in a flash, the batsman tanling himself up in a would-be sweep
pops up outside off, the batsman cuts down to the man at short third man, Kapugedera sets off, but Murali sends him back wisely
waits for the ball outside off, and driven out to the covers
outside off, the batsman makes room to drive hard out to long-on
steps back to open up the leg-side and push-drive out between midwicket and mid-on
low full toss, whip-driven out to mid-on
backs away and goes across the line aiming towards midwicket and missed it completely, the ball veering down leg, catching the right thigh and moving a touch back to just clip leg stick
pushed him on to the back foot in front of off stump, defended on the front foot
a soft dismissal to end a fine innings, Kapugedera coming out and poppin up a soft return pull to Harbhajan who had pinged the ball down off

inn2.comm: pushed across the left hander from over the wicket, Uthappa pushing forward defensively this time
much of the same, Uthappa watching the ball on to the bat defensively
edged and dropped! Vaas got him playing wide of off-stump, both went for it, Jayawardene got a hand to it on his left
wide again, pushed down off the back foot to point
outside off, wrists it down to third man for a comfortable two
short, wide and low, the batsman cutting hard off the back foot through point
starts with a wide down leg
straight, sharp, short and defended down off the back foot straight forward
on off, clipped well off the legs and it went slightly aerial
on off, defended on the front foot with a rising ball
on middle and off, turned off the legs in front of square
on to him a touch too quickly and he tried to flick through the on-side once more, a leading edge flies up to mid-on and it's calmly taken by Amerasinghe
outside off, short, and defended down to the gully
outside off, back of a length, driven square to point
width outside off, shortish, and he goes hard with a back-foot cut up and over point
up there on off, defended on the front foot, tightly
on leg, tucked up though, fended into the leg-side without too much drama
rolled down outside off, angling across him towards the slips
more of the same, the batsman again not tempted
outside off, down off on a good length, the batsman leaves that with shouldered arms
outside off, short, well fielded at point as it's pushed there off the back foot
outside off, cut hard off the back foot through backward point. Laced
on off, popped up there towards the gully off the back foot
fired through down off, the ball rising from a good length and left alone
on the legs, tucked well off the hips
good line on off, rising up from a good length, and defended back down
shot through outside off
up there on a good length just outside off, defended back down into the ground
outside off, nearly dragged back on from outside off with an inside edge which squirts through leg
on middle and off, good length, defended back down on the back foot, watched for the change of pace and angled his bat in defence
comes out of his crease and takes an outside edge which goes to gully, Tendulkar trying to drive that one
short ball on off whipped to square with a wristy improvisation
nipped away outside off, jumped into the line to drive out on the back foot to the covers
a swing and a miss outside off, the ball flashing over theedge as he shaped to cut
strays too far on leg, whipped down there to fine leg
full ball on off and middle, turned off the legs to short midwicket
short bouncer, looked to pull it over his head, but didn't get the outside edge, they still appeal though
on off, good length, defended  back down
comes outside off, pushed to the covers on the front foot
outside off, turned down to gully off the back foot
outside off on the back foot, comes right out and drives with an open blade square through point
comes forward and defends on the front foot
waits in line to defend down off the back foot, straight
stands tall on off, and pushes into short midwicket off the back foot
waits outside off to meet a slightly wide one, cuts hard to point
defended back down on the front foot in line with off
on off and somehow picks the gap through the very packed off-side ring with a push off the back foot through point
short ball on off, goes too high over him
another wide, this one down leg
comes forward and defends on the front foot this time
on a good line and length, defended well on the front foot
comes in slightly at him from over the wicket, he pushed back out to the covers
defended on the front foot again
excellent fielding*, driven into the ground and then flying up above Kapugedera who leaps to stop it
outside off, gets it through the gap now, with a punch-drive through the covers
outside off, driven on the front foot to the covers
wide outside off and hammered through point
stays over for the left hander, aimed on off stump and it's defended off the back foot into the short covers
outside off, flashes off the back foot into the covers
slower ball looped on outside off, driven out through the covers where Malinga chases very well to slide and stop the ball
on leg and turned off the legs through midwicket where Vaas can't get there despite some crashing commitment which involves trying to stab the ball with his boot then jumping over the rope
outside off, cut hard at the tope of the bounce and off the back foot. That travelled
outside off again and spanks a hard cut in front of point this time
overpitched on off, driven out to mid-off and they run through quickly
beats him outside off, nipped away from outside off, the batsman plays and misses
width outside off, that was short too, and the batsman rises on his back foot and drives out past the lazy cover
a tighter ball this time, and defended tightly on the front foot
whipped off the toes in front of midwicket
overpitched outside off, driven on the up to mid-on
on leg and got away with a looseish one which is worked on the front foot hard indeed to midwicket
outside off, rises on to the back foot and pushes to the gully
stands tall and drives out to mid-on
swings back in and is worked off the inside edge out to square, that should have been a cover drive there
better ball on middle and off, rushed into the ground
a hint of swing but too wide and Tendulkar crashes through the covers with a crunching drive
strays on to leg, clipped there tightly behind square where the ball rolled towards the fielder at deep backward square
a quality shot there, on middle and off, Tendulkar somehow whips it through square, not much wrong with the ball
short ball boomed straight over the batsman, good reply
on leg and middle, rising and Tendulkar looks to turn it square but it was on him too quickly and nearly in his ribs, saved by the ball hitting his gloves
goes for the pull again, short and sharp and that would have been whipped round through midwicket, instead it hit him in the ribs this time
low full toss turned out to deep square
short, wide and pushed out to point, the direct hit from Dilshan allows the overthrow as it ricochets off awkwardly
on middle, dead straight, and defended on the front foot back towards the bowler
outside off, cut off the front foot unusually, and straight to the fielder
bent back in towards him and pushed out to the covers on the front foot
turned off the legs down to long leg where Murali wings back in well and Sangakkara takes the bails but the batsman was already home
outside off, pushed into the covers on the front foot
full ball on off, driven out to mid-off
fired past him down off, good length and nearly has his man after Gambhir's head rush of a cover drive
slower ball on leg, looked to swish it to leg on the back foot but checks the shot
outside off, drives up and over long-off, the ball travelling well
short ball on middle, lifts it up and over midwicket and on towards deep midwicket, just about safe, the ball on to him faster than he had realised
overpitched outside off and driven through the covers without much power
outside off, short ball, late cut with an easy steer to third man
swivelled in on middle and leg, a good length, and the batsman defends easily in front of him
dropped! Another one which goes in between keeper and slip, this one was just wide of the right side of Jayawardene who's at a wide first slip, almost a second slip
tight delivery on off this time, pushed forward defensively
good ball on middle, no harm in defending that one
pushed up there on off, very full, and a straightforward defence results
on to the legs and turned well to midwicket
comes round the wicket and shuffles up into bowl, planting outside off, full pitch, the ball driven out to the covers
Tendulkar's fifty, his first of the series, comes up in fine style with a very fine clip through fine leg
brings up the team 100 next ball, coming down the track and liftin a short one from middle right over long-off
down leg, tries to sweep round
on leg again, and tucked round behind square
reaches outside off to drive to the covers now
outside off, pressed down defensively on the front foot
more defence
outside off, tries to work it away this time
does get it away this time with a huge up-and-over backward point... advancing down and flaying it hard. Fetch that
responds with a push down off, good length
swung it back in to the left hander who waits on the back foot to the covers
slower ball, driven into the covers, an easy run for Gambhir
on leg, pulled round behind square
pushed forward
on leg, stabbed out with a push-prod to square
hello, nearly massive, as Tendulkar rocks back and scoops an off-drive high and far but it plugged in the deep. All timing in that shot
plays on the back foot, defended on the back foot
width outside off, driven out wide of mid-on
moves back to give himself room to drive out square to point and bring up the hundred partnership and it's been an authoritative one indeed with hardly a chance
Gambhir's turn to rock back and cut hard to point
full delivery, defended on the front foot out to mid-off
full delivery again, pushed out to long-off this time
pitches outside off, the ball turns towards outside leg, and turned off the legs to square
an inside out drive out to long-off, well bowled by Murali throwing it up on middle and leg, Tendulkar went wider and didn't quite control the shot and it was well caught by Silva in the deep
watches that one go past him, turning out quite wildly
right up there on off, defended forward
outside off, driven out to extra cover
on leg, turned out from the batsman, who drives out to cover
on leg, turned down gently behind square
spun in from outside off, and driven back out to mid-off
comes in on off, driven back out to the fielder at mid-off
on the legs, turned out square
driven out to mid-on quietly
pushed up there on off, defended on the front foot
pushed right up there on middle and off, defended on the front foot with no alarm
pushed across him on off, driven out to the covers gently
up there, defended on the front foot
right up there on off, driven out to mid-off
on leg, turned back in and defended on the front foot
outside off, stabbed out towards deep extra cover
on leg, turned back in, and pushed back to backward square
round the wicket to the left hander, pushes on off, Yuvraj drives back out to mid-on
up there on off, driven on to the legs this time
a vert stylish four that one, Yuvraj coming down the track and wristing up and over a lovely on-drive, his back foot coming up as he did so
outside off, rocks into a well-timed cover drive of a four off the back foot. Placement and a half
driven to mid-off this time
driven to long-off now, a gentle push, and they jog through the single
my word, a tremendous shot, Murali tossed it up on off and Yuvraj stood tall and thumped that over long-on with whisperingly good timing
defended on the front foot this time
opens up his body so he can turn it off the legs to midwicket for another good shot
on off, driven out carefully to mid-on now
outside off, driven out to mid-off
up there again but the batsman merely drives back out to mid-on
defended forward outside off
outside off, tighter, and pushed back to the man at gully. There's a slip in, too
another push to mid-off
outside off, steered down off the back foot through the gully
another good hit, worked out on the off-side
played forward defensively
driven out wide
driven out to the covers
down on one knee and rockets that hard and flat through midwicket
driven out to long-off
pushed forward
outside off, launched hard over long-on
rock solid on the back foot, leaps into the line to defend
on the off side and a touch short, launches a smashing crashing pull shot in front of midwicket
defended on the front foot this time
driven out to the covers
stands tall and defends into the covers this time on the front foot, creeping down the track as he goes
stands tall and drives out to Vaas at mid-off
loop on to the off stump, defended on the front foot
thrown up on off, a dipping full toss is driven out to the covers
outside off, driven out through the covers
driven out for a quick single
pushed on the front foot
pushed out into the covers
pushed out to the covers and they shuffle through
on the legs and pushed out to midwicket
driven out to mid-on

Caught by Dilshan at cover!! delivery looped up on the off, curving in and spins away from the left hander sharply, Yuvraj comes on the frontfoot and looks to go for the expansive cover drive, finds the man, tame dismissal and Yuvraj departs just
leans forward to defend
full and outside off, steered to point
floated outside off, opens the bat-face and guides to slip
on the middle and leg, Gambhir turns it to short fine leg region
leans forward to defend a delivery outside off stump
doosra, coming in and Gambhir is on the front foot and jabs it to the on side
clips on to the legs, turned round the corner
defended tightly on the front foot
off the mark with a flick to leg
brushed on to the legs, the ball running up the bat and on to the arm
outside off, driven well to the man at mid-off
rattled on to off stump, driven out to mid-off
pushed well on to the legs and the scores are now level
turned off the legs to seal the win easily and that's a deserved victory for India
